content: "I miei occhi mi stanno davvero dicendo la verità?", rispose il vecchio, stropicciandosi gli occhi. "Sei veramente il mio caro Pinocchio?"
translations: eng:Are my eyes really telling me the truth﹖ answered the old man, rubbing his eyes. Are you really my own dear Pinocchio﹖
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
